name: use_skill

player_name.description: Unique name of the current player to determine skill ownership and progression.

scene_name.description: The name of the current scene in which the skill is being used.

skill_name.description: Name of the skill being used.

is_available.description: Indicates whether the skill is currently available to the player.

is_usable_in_scene.description: Indicates whether the skill can be used within the context of the current scene.

description: Manages the usage of skills based on skill availability and scene context.
